name: Super Goribei
description:
This is a classic mario-style game. With a dark and lonely theme set in a colorful or black and white game world.


Goribei's Story Setup

The protaganist is set in a lost and mixed up world where the darkness grabs at everything every night. Feasting at the protaganist and will be a mystrery
that unfolds as you travel the road to find the truth.



the game wuss set for early access but its got released do to a mix up so here is some of the things that will come in updates
100 levels or more will be added
steam achievement
more story
boss battles

Game Info
-Xbox Controller support
-Mario like
-Retro platformer
-pixeleated fun
-Comic like story
